title: OGSR/Administration of Small Business Loan Programs Held by an Economic Development Agency

abstracts.abstract: OGSR/Administration of Small Business Loan Programs Held by an Economic Development Agency;  Amending a provision which provides an exemption from public records requirements for certain information relating to the administration of small business loan programs held by an economic development agency; deleting the scheduled repeal of the exemption, etc.

actions.description: Submitted for consideration by Commerce and Tourism
On Committee agenda-- Commerce and Tourism, 12/10/25, 11:30 am, 110 Senate Building
Submitted as Committee Bill and Reported Favorably by Commerce and Tourism; YEAS 7 NAYS 1

documents.note: Bill Analysis -- Commerce and Tourism (Pre-Meeting) (12/9/2025 11:34 AM)
